body.text: Moves the ship based on where the user taps

thenBody.text: invisible sprite that the ship is moving towards

decls.name: ship moveto

body.text: Since the projectile will be separated over the x axis, a random y can be returned
Even if the player hits a coin and a projectile, the game should still end
